did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Governor Timothy M. Kaine Administration YouTube Channel Videos, 2008-2010

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia. Governor (2006-2010 : Kaine), YouTube Channel Videos, 2008-2010, Accession 51918, State Records Collection, Library of Virginia

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These videos were originally posted onto YouTube by Gov. Kaine's Webmaster. Between 2008 and 2010, Library of Virginia staff downloaded the videos using GetTube software and Perian Web developer's toolkit.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The downloaded Kaine YouTube Channel vidoes were uploaded to the Library's YouTube channel by Library staff. All descriptive metadata was copied from the original upload on Governor Kaine's YouTube Channel.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Timothy M. Kaine was Virginia's 70th governor. He served from January 2006 to January 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 63 videos that were originally posted onto YouTube by Governor Tim Kaine's Webmaster between March 2008 and January 2010. Governor Kaine formally announced the creation of the governor's YouTube channel in a 6 May 2008 press release.

Included are vidoes of news conferences, transportation town hall meetings, cabinet day events, the 2008 dedication of the Virginia Civil Rights Memorial, Governor Kaine's statement on granting clemency to the Norfolk Four, and Governor Kaine's 2009 State of the Commonwealth address.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine talks about ways Virginians can conserve energy. Uploaded 21 April 2008.

extref.emph: 2. Gov. Kaine's Opening Remarks, Martinsville Town Hall, 26 March 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine's opening remarks at the town hall meeting in Martinsville, March 26, 2008. Uploaded on 23 April 2008.

extref.emph: 3. Questions for Gov. Kaine, Martinsville Town Hall, Part 1, 26 March 2008.

scopecontent.p: Part 1 of Q and A with Governor Kaine at the town hall meeting in Martinsville, March 26, 2008. Uploaded 24 April 2008.

extref.emph: 4. Questions for Gov. Kaine, Martinsville Town Hall, Part 2, 26 March 2008.

scopecontent.p: Part 2 of Q and A with Governor Kaine at the town hall meeting in Martinsville, March 26, 2008. Uploaded 24 April 2008.

extref.emph: 5. Gov. Kaine and Martinsville High School Students, 26 March 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine speaks with students before his town hall meeting at Martinsville High School, March 26, 2008. Uploaded 24 April 2008.

extref.emph: 6. National Employee Health and Fitness Day, 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine speaks about National Employee Health and Fitness Day and encourages workers in Virginia to walk for fitness on Wednesday May 21, 2008. Uploaded 2 May 2008.

extref.emph: 7. Governor Kaine Unveils Transportation Plan, 12 May 2008.

scopecontent.p: On May 12, 2008, Governor Timothy M. Kaine released details of his transportation plan and called for a special session of the General Assembly to address transportation on June 23. Uploaded 12 May 2008.

extref.emph: 8. Governor Kaine - Woodbridge Transportation Town Hall - Opening Remarks, 13 May 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine delivers opening remarks during the transportation town hall in Woodbridge, VA on May 13, 2008. Uploaded on 14 May 2008.

extref.emph: 9. Governor Kaine - Marion Transportation Town Hall, 20 May 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine's opening remarks during the transportation town hall in Marion, VA on May 20, 2008. Uploaded 21 May 2008.

extref.emph: 10. Staunton Transportation Town Hall - Opening Remarks, 22 May 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine delivers opening remarks during the transportation town hall in Staunton, VA on May 22, 2008. Uploaded 28 May 2008.

extref.emph: 11. Staunton Transportation Town Hall - Q and A, 22 May 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine takes questions during the transportation town hall in Staunton, VA on May 22, 2008. Uploaded 28 May 2008.

extref.emph: 12. Higher Education Bond Bill Signing, 29 May 2008.

scopecontent.p: Virginia's Governor, Tim Kaine, delivers remarks and signs the higher education bond bill from the 2008 General Assembly session. Uploaded 29 May 2008.
Governor Kaine ceremonially signs legislation from the 2008 General Assembly session regarding Virginia's efforts to prevent and respond to sexual violence. Uploaded 2 June 2008.
Governor Kaine ceremonially signs several animal welfare bills from the 2008 General Assembly session. The bill signing took place at the Richmond SPCA. Uploaded 5 June 2008.

extref.emph: 15. Radford Transportation Town Hall - Opening Remarks, 4 June 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine delivers opening remarks during the transportation town hall in Radford, VA on June 4, 2008. Uploaded 5 June 2008.

extref.emph: 16. Radford Transportation Town Hall - Q and A, 4 June 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine takes questions during the transportation town hall in Radford, VA on June 4, 2008. Uploaded 6 June 2008.

extref.emph: 17. Danville Transportation Town Hall - Opening Remarks, 7 June 2008.

scopecontent.p: Danville Transportation Town Hall - Opening Remarks. Uploaded 9 June 2008.

extref.emph: 18. Danville Transportation Town Hall - Q and A, 7 June 2008.

scopecontent.p: Governor Kaine takes questions during the transportation town hall in Danville, VA on June 7, 2008. Uploaded 10 June 2008.

unittitle.extref: -Joint Transportation Special Session of the General Assembly, 23 June 2008.

scopecontent.p: Virginia's Governor Tim Kaine addresses the Joint Transportation Special Session of the General Assembly on June 23, 2008. Uploaded on 23 June 2008.
Governor Timothy M. Kaine announces measures to respond to Virginia's budget shortfall. Uploaded 9 October 2008.

As part of the Governor's tenth Cabinet Community Day on October 14, 2008, he and members of his cabinet visit Fairfax County's new McConnell Public Safety and Transportation Operations Center. Uploaded 28 October 2008.
